coreAttributes.authorTag: On the back of the shield, slightly raised lettering reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: Enforcer's riot shield
coreAttributes.description: A medium-sized shield made of transparent polycarbonate, it covers an average-sized bearer from the top of their head to their knees. It is enchanted to protect against weapons typically used by rioters as well as offer limited offensive capabilities.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] out the shield and [npc.verb(strap)] it to [npc.her] arm.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unstrap)] the the shield from [npc.her] arm before putting it away.
coreAttributes.onCriticalHitEffect: #IF !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_DAZED) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_DAZED, 4)] [npc.Name] managed to body [npc2.name] to the ground! [npc2.She] [style.boldPhysical([npc2.verb(feel)] unsteady)] as [npc2.she] gets up. #ENDIF

hitDescriptions.hitText: Charging forward with [npc.her] riot shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to hit [npc2.name] dead on. The enchanted polycarbonate bounces off [npc2.her] aura and knocks [npc2.herHim] back, draining [npc.her] energy!

missDescriptions.missText: Charging forward with [npc.her] riot shield, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to hit [npc2.name] dead on but stumbles and misses completely!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swings)] [npc.her] riot shield out at [npc2.name] but misses!
